Cardboard boxes can be used as a makeshift fort or playhouse for children. Cut out windows and doors, and paint the box to make it more fun and exciting.
A cardboard box can be used as a storage container for small items, such as toys or office supplies.
Cardboard boxes can be used as a DIY pet bed or scratching post for cats. Cut out a small opening for the cat to enter and fill the box with soft materials like blankets or pillows.
A cardboard box can be used as a DIY birdhouse. Cut out a small entrance and several ventilation holes, and paint the box to make it more attractive to birds.
Cardboard boxes can be used as a DIY bookshelf. Cut out several shelves and stack them on top of each other to create a tall bookshelf.
